t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - The private label Mama Bear sells baby wipes, baby food, diaper pail refills and baby laundry detergent. In 2018, the brand began selling newborn through size six diapers, which were previously offered by the Amazon Elements private brand before their removal from the site in 2014.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 4 hours ago - Amazon opened its tenth physical bookstore in 2017; media speculation at the time suggested that Amazon planned to eventually roll out 300 to 400 bookstores around the country. All of its locations were closed in 2022 along with other retail locations under the "Amazon 4-Star" brand.

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. Consumers will need to provide a photograph of disposal and their order number to receive the refund. Whisper08 is contacting all known purchasers directly.Until these faucets can be replaced, ...
